name: Elsegar I: Arrival
description:
Welcome to Elsegar!

After experimenting on a strange object, you are transported to whole new world with one goal in mind, to find a way home. Talk to locals, fight a monster using a crowbar, go underwater, find secrets, and more!

Design, Story, Cover Art, and Programming:
    Silicon14
